scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run create:logs && npm run push
scripts.push: cd app && gcloud -q app deploy app.yaml
scripts.create:logs: mkdir app/logs && touch app/logs/access.log && touch app/logs/console.log && touch app/logs/error.log
scripts.f:dev: docker-compose exec ajc-front npm run dev
scripts.b:dev: docker-compose exec ajc-back npm run dev
scripts.b:inspect: docker-compose exec ajc-back npm run inspect
